Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Heng Sokchan (Mr.)  070 555 494 / 017 735 688 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070 555 494 / 017 735 688

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
** Other Tasks/Daily Work

• Conduct teaching observation
• Academic, events, contests and other performances observation
• CA and Sponsorship program checking every week
• Report card checking
• Do rounds and report
• Create and maintain good communication and information sharing with teachers
• Final exam editor/updates
• New Students Interview
• Student Opinion Survey
• Monthly Report review
• Meeting parents on PTA
• Open Field Study (Coordinate with Teachers)
• Coordinating teachers’ requests (leaves, schedule, visa extension and others)
• Counseling students (mischievous, problem makers…) change shift, Promote, and Demote students
• Being a judge on students’ class project
• Being a judge on AEP major presentation
• Being an interviewer on level 1, 7, 12 and kid 12 oral interview
• Teacher and Students charity projects
• Solving all academic issues in station and other general cases within building
• Split Class, Combine Class, Cancel Class, Change Class, Swap Class
• Report, finalize, and record all related issues from teachers, students and other staff.
• Check the libraries, comment and give ideas to improve the library. Monitor the teachers using the libraries.
• Check the use of the homework log
• Check the Reading Campaign
• Check the English Speaking Environment
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor/Master degree in Education or related field
• Management experiences in education and related fields
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖

•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍

•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ

•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
•Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. job title: Head of Academic Secretary_Siem Reap Campus
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Head of Academic Secretary_Siem Reap Campus
Job Description:
• Follow and maintains knowledge of all school policies and procedures.
• Perform general office duties including answering multi-line phones, routing telephone calls or messages to appropriate staff, greeting the public, typing, proofreading, filing, sorting and handling incoming and outgoing mail, as needed.
• Research, create, input, format, organize and edit relevant data as needed or requested and prepare in a usable format for the school.
• Completes a high volume of computer work, using school computer and programs, to input a high volume of data with speed and accuracy, including confidential data, in an environment with constant interruptions.
• Processes and tracks employee timesheets and work with the personnel officer and the HRD for approval.
• Assists in preparing school materials (i.e., brochures, newsletters, learning materials etc.).
• Reconciles account balances and financial documentation (Request form, cash receipts, and approval) ensuring accuracy.
• Independently or in accordance with general instruction, composes correspondence on a wide range of subjects, requiring knowledge of procedures and policies of the assigned area.
• Serves as receptionist and gives information or directs visitors and parents to appropriate offices, as needed.
• Answers inquiries concerning standardized policies, procedures, and regulations.
• Coordinates scheduling of meetings, appointments and travel and assists with all other administrative needs.
• Schedules conferences, programs, events and teachers individual schedule as required including creating schedules, contacting all invited parties, preparing confirmation and distributing materials to teachers.
• Places orders for all classroom and office supplies, as needed or requested.
• Professionally represents the school and the District in interactions with parents, community, staff and students.
• Maintains appropriate certifications and training hours as required.
• Attends work regularly and is punctual.
• Supervise academic secretary
• Check and process the sick and annual leave
• Process and confirm teacher and staff probation with HR
• Monitor and report the monthly teacher tardiness
• Arrange and monitor with the personnel officer the teacher written test
• Help and arrange the teacher interview with the personnel officer.
• Work and check with the personnel officer the in and out process of the teachers
• Work with Personnel officer and Submit the monthly staff movement:
• Promotion
• Change position
• Change campus
• Change working hours
• Suspension, fire, lay off, ditch
• Write and keep Aii Academic Secretary history record (All Campuses)
• Update Academic and secretary staff details
• Ensure and evaluate all teaching materials and equipment are in good condition.
• Ensure and maintain the order of the academic office
• Maintain records and files especially teachers and other staff CVs
• Write and submit history of the academic events every month
• Process new teacher and academic staff the username, email and MJQ server etc.
• Other assigned tasks
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor degree in Education/Administration or related fields
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

Job Description:
* Job Duties:
- Installs new equipment by adjusting, establishing, testing, and calibrating performance
- Approves potential biomedical equipment by guaranteeing that codes are adhered to
- Maintains supplies inventory by foreseeing needs, counting stock, placing orders, and verifying delivery
- Directs operation of biomedical equipment by providing demonstrations, supplying information and data, instructing others in the care and use of equipment, and answering all questions
- Keeps biomedical equipment in working order by performing tests, following preventive maintenance guides, repairing and troubleshooting break downs, evaluating service contracts, ordering special services if necessary, and maintaining inventories
- Prepares reports by analyzing, collecting, and recapping trends and information
- Updates job skills and knowledge by reading technical journals, taking advantage of educational opportunities, and maintaining professional networks
- Keeps patient information confidential
- Carries out the goals of the organization by exploring opportunities to add significance to job duties, and by accomplishing different and innovative requests
- Maintains a healthy and safe working environment by fulfilling and recommending procedures, performing safety tests, complying with codes, and guiding and training health care and medical personnel
Company Profile:
** About The Prestige Hospital

Our vision is to become the premier provider of healthcare services in Cambodia. Through the investment in our team of healthcare professionals and in the latest medical technologies, we aim to deliver international standard, world class patient care, and exceptional patient experience in a broad range of disciplines including women's health, maternity, paediatric, family medicine, chronic disease management, and dentistry.
Prestige Hospital is set in a quiet and prestigious residential neighbourhood close to Independence Monument in central Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Prestige Hospital is proud to take a patient-centric approach to care before, during, and after treatment and recovery. Our internationally-trained team of professionals, state of the art operating rooms and equipment, luxuriously appointed recovery suites and personalized attention ensure that patients receive safe, comfortable, and high-quality care - all in a beautiful setting.

Job Description:

• Promote and represent the center both internally and externally

• the fulfilment of the center´s responsibilities concerning students in respect of their admission, instruction, progress and examination;
• the availability of academic assistance

Knowledge Transfer

People Management
• Ensure that School HR policies and procedures are

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
STRATEGIC PURPOSE:
• To Guide the Sales Assessment Supervisor (SAS) to Carry out the In-Field Audit with the Sales Teams with objectives to uplift the Sales Capabilities.
• To compile and gather the results from SAS for the Field Audit reports by Region and by Province with the objective of closing the Sales Capabilities Gaps.

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES:
• To Supervise and guides the SAS to carry out the Field Audits focus on the company’s 4 Key Enablers (Sales Tools, Winning Team, Perfect Serve, Excellent Outlet Execution) and 5 Winning’s Behaviors (Learn to Improve, Keep It Simple, Life-Saving Rules, Collaborate Through Trust, Speed & Action)
• To Guide and Lead the SAS to Track and Monitor the performance of the Sales Team against the standards (FIT, PICOS & EOE), identify the gaps, and propose the training program to meet the changes in the markets and competition’s condition.
• To gather the reports from SAS to identify the Sales Capabilities gaps, propose the action plans and work together with the RSM to close the gaps.
• To gather and analyst the reports from SAS, collaborate with Sales Development Manager to improve the In-Field Coaching program and standard. Establish & propose to Improve the measurements for perfect execution in the market.
• To ensure the Track, Rank & Publish (TRP) program is carried out in every Region.
• To Track and Monitors the efficiency and effectiveness of FIT (Focus, Implementation & Tracking) and Picture of Success (PICOS) implementation in the Region.
• People Development 
   o Learn to Improve and Self Development Behaviors
   o Succession planning
   o To conduct the In-Field Coaching with Sales Assessment Supervisor, RSM & ASM.
Job Requirement:
• Preferably a minimum of 5 years in an FMCG environment with at least 2 years managerial experience in Sales and Training or Coaching roles, ideally in an FMCG/beer environment.
• Having experience in Training Consultant is highly preferred. 
• Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy and reliability.
• Excellent communication skills (interpersonal/ presentation/ Computer)
• Coaching and mentoring skills.
• Good at interpersonal skills.
• Solid analytical, Planning, and Organizing skills.
• Excellent business acumen and a good understanding of the market with entrepreneurial zest.
• Self-starter mindset, Self-Confident, good work Ethic, Assertive and Problem-solving skills.
• Effective, Positive and Energetic Attitude.
• Ability to communicate clearly - Decent presentation skills.
• Strong Leadership skills, Team-orientation, and ability to coach the team.
• Action-oriented, persistent, and result-oriented.

** We offer attractive remuneration and other benefits with career development opportunities.

** Applicants are invited to submit their CVs and cover letter to the provided email address as below. Only shortlisted applicants will be notified.

With our passion, we will be sure to make a positive mark on the beverage industry in Cambodia.

Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Oversee the school campus.
• Plan for and execute the continuous growth of the campus.
• Read and respond to teaching and non-teaching staff term report.
• Monitor student, teaching and non-teaching staff opinion survey and result.
• Prepare teaching schedule.
• Monitor personnel management (staff details, staff requisition, CV shortlist, contract, timesheet check, leave check, monthly staff movement, salary addition and deduction, absence record, etc.)
• Establish and maintain professional and cooperative working relationships with all stakeholders:
• parents, students, staff, neighbors, and partners.
• Supervise school and public safety and school maintenance.
• Supervises the maintenance of student records, including assessment results, test scores, discipline citations, and other documents.
• Prepare and process field trip requests.
• Maintain and update school website regularly.
• Prepare and maintains purchase orders and other expense records; approve, and monitor expenditures and ensure expenditures are within budget allowances for the year.
• Prepare necessary forms to hire, upgrade, terminate or authorize special payments to staff.
• Recruit qualified and experienced teachers and staff.
• Plans, assigns, trains, and evaluate classified staff in accordance with school standards, timelines, and procedures.
• Plan the arrangements for school contests and events and community activities.
• Act as liaison between school and other schools, the parents, outside agencies, and the public.
• Develop, implement, and monitor work practices, systems, and methods that are effective, efficient, and consistent with school standards, policies, and procedures.
• Prepare annual school calendar and plan the arrangements for school contests and events and community activities.
• Promote and maintain a positive and effective school climate by ensuring that all interactions with staff, students, parents, and the public at large are prompt, efficient, helpful and friendly.
• Seek out and participate in educational and professional development.
• Recognize problems and impediment and report them promptly with solutions to the President
• Monitor and analyze student performance assessment data preparing reports as needed for various special projects.
• Perform other duties as assigned by Chairman and President
• Read all comments from the student opinion survey about their teachers and the school as a whole.
• Take actions on those comments where and when applicable.
• Read all comments or complaints sent by the Information Office. Solve them where and when applicable.
• Update all handbooks regularly, usually termly, based on the changes of the policies.
• Go and check each cafeteria twice per week in each building and write a report and then submit to the Office of the President every week.
• Do the CBC round as schedule.
• Get the P&L, CF, BS of each business and service units every month from Finance Department. Call for a meeting with those business and service units every month.
Job Requirement:
• Master degree in Education or related field
• Management experiences in education and related fields
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY				
"The Restaurant Manager is responsible for daily running of operations, planning, control and coordination of all activities of personnel engaged in serving food and beverages. He/She possesses good knowledge of food & beverage, up selling and availability of menu items.
He/She strives to continually improve guest and employee satisfaction and maximize the financial performance in areas of responsibility."				

DUTIES & RESPONSABILITIES

-To oversea the dining area, supervises food and beverage service staff in accordance with operating policies.			
-To supervise staff to be aware of all the restaurant’s policies and procedures (company’s policy, service standard, grooming & personal hygiene, DO & DON’T in Restaurant). And he/himself or she/herself get good practice as sample for others			
-To supervise the staff to ensure excellent food presentation and proper food-handling procedures.			
Check the quality of deliveries of fresh food and baked goods.			
-To maintain health & safety procedures and sanitation levels at any given period of time.			
-To be responsible for overall store operations.			
-To supervise food stock and order + beverage stock and order on a daily basis.			
-To oversee staffing of kitchen, counter and dining area.			
-To prepare in-store action plan and implement promotional plan organized by the Marketing department for achieving sales targets.			
-To create a positive team atmosphere among team members.			
-To maintain records of staff periodic manner and operating costs.			
-To train, develop and guide subordinates staff to well perfom the job.			
-To double check security procedures both front and back of the house.			
-To work long hours that usually include evenings, holidays and weekdays.			
-To assist in planning regular and special event menu.			
-Total receipts and balance against sales, deposit receipts, and lock facility at end of day.			
-To count and manage stocks properly by spot checking of cashier standards.			
-To investigate and resolve guests complaints regarding food quality, service and cleanliness.			
-To provide a memorable experience for all guests; to interact with internal and external customers to build positive relationship.			
-To prepare weekly and monthly reports to Brand Managers
Job Requirement:
- Degree or Diploma in F&B sector  				
- Has effectively managed Team Members for minimum 1 year. Previous experience in similar job role is required.				
- Must possess excellent organizational and planning skills.				
- Ability to work under pressure. Self motivated with a positive and professional approach to management.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   081515888 | 099515888 | 0883145636 recruitment@limgroup.biz 032, St.288, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kong III - Khan Boeng Keng Korng - Phnom Penh 081515888 | 099515888 | 0883145636

job title: Truck Operator Driver អ្នកបើកបរឡានត្រាក់ទ័រ​
position: Truck Operator Driver អ្នកបើកបរឡានត្រាក់ទ័រ​
Job Description:
•	បើកបរនៅកន្លែងការងារនៅការដ្ឋានខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ
•	បំពេញភារកិច្ចប្រតិបត្តិការទៅនឹងស្តង់ដាររបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	អនុវត្តការងារយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយក្រុម និងប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
•	អនុវត្តកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការដឹកនាំរបស់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
•	សម្អាត និងថែទាំត្រាក់ទ័រ គ្រឿងចក្រ អោយមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងមានសុវត្ថិភាព
•	បំពេញភារកិច្ចប្រកបដោយសុវត្ថិភាព
Job Requirement:
•	ត្រូវមានបណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទ (គ C) ត្រឹមត្រូវ
•	បទពិសោធន៏យ៉ាងហោចណាស់២ឆ្នាំក្នុងការបើកបរ
•	អាចអាន និង សរសេរ អក្សរខ្មែរបាន
•	ធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
•	អាចបើកបរគ្រឿងចក្រផ្សេងៗទៀតបាន (មានអាទិភាព)
•	មានសមត្ថភាពរៀបចំការងារឱ្យកាន់តែមានផលិតភាពនិងទាន់ពេលវេលា
•	មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការលើកឡើងនិងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.

7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
- Work Location: Phnom Penh
- Salary Range : 3500$-4500$
- Purpose of the position:

** Key Responsibilities and Duties:
1- To have 10 years or minimum 2 mixed development project manager experience in the high rise buildings and independently handle and take charge of all site activities , correspondence , co-ordination , documentations, Lead the site team, deal with main contractors and NCS, Monitor the works, work quality and safety.
2- Comments and give approval to the shop drawings, specifications, catalogues and samples against to the contract specification and client’s requirements.
3- Update all the project info, consultant’s instruction, variation works and rectification works and report to the management and Project Director
4- Site inspections, checking and give approval to installation and site constructions.
5- Proper site document filing, submit fortnightly and monthly report to the management and PD
6- Coordination to the top management, consultants, contractors, suppliers and any related parties including any procurements
7- Carry out the assessment to the contractor, quality of the work, work progress and workmanship monthly and report to the top management and PD.
8- Reply all the correspondence letter, emails, RFA & RFI and keep records.

- Bachelor Degree in Civil Engineering or related fields
- Interior Design, or Architecture
- A Postgraduate Degree in construction management is a plus
- At least 5 year experiences in construction projects
- Good computer literacy in AutoCAD, Google Sketchup, Microsoft Project
- Ability to plan and organize a team effort

job title: Farm Manager $1,400 - $2,000 ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
position: Farm Manager $1,400 - $2,000 ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
Job Description:
- Planning, management and profitability of the Operations Unit, accountabilities include winning and executing projects, staffing for operations department and other managerial functions
- Assists in the annual preparation of sales projections, expense budgets, and capital expenditure budgets
- Plans, organizes and directs all departments at the Operations unit level, responsible for achievement of overall company objectives
- Provides technical and administrative expertise and support for specific operations
- Liaison between the projects, other department and CEO 
- Ultimately responsible for managing operations people and resources, and the profit/loss performance of the Operations
- Develop and recommend annual operating and capital budget for the operations group, report on actual results against plan, implement and execute plans approved by CEO
- Develop and achieve positive operating statements and performance graphs having goals and targets, as per company objectives
- Direct all contracts with a hands-on approach to the day-to-day activities of the division
- Develop and implement strategic plans for contracts ensuring that all goals are either achieved or better with an emphasis upon service delivery
- Effectively manage all activities with regards to operations, construction, staff, quality, health and safety and business planning
- Hold regular review meetings with the staff in developing a proactive focus upon quality, overheads, manpower, programming, organization and delivery aspects
- Ensure a high level of teamwork and cohesion between all levels of staff
- Report on ongoing issues keeping them informed of any potential problems that could affect the business
- Manage day-today operation of the business ensure everything run smoothly
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s degree in related field such as Management, Sales & Marketing or Finance 
- Minimum 5 years working experience in the managerial levels in the mentioned area and or related
- Honest, highly responsible and reliable
- Good computer literacy (Internet and Email, Ms. Word, Excel)
- Ability to manage multi-tasks
- Proven management skills and ability to negotiate effectively with partners 
- Knowledge of data analysis and financial assessment 
- Proficient in English speaking, report writing and presentation
- Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful, high commitment, competence and motivation

job title: Finance Manager ( Work at Royal Hong Lai Huat One Company Limited )
position: Finance Manager ( Work at Royal Hong Lai Huat One Company Limited )
Job Description:
** Company Name: Royal Hong Lai Huat One Company Limited

•  Responsible for the effective running of all support areas, i.e. Finance, Legal Compliance, data and IT, ensuring that meets its financial and compliance obligations for HLH 
•  As a member of the Management team, contributes to strategic and operational planning and oversight, and where required;
•  Leads project initiatives and teams
•  Provide professional financial, and advice management ensuring compliance with all HLH Group Policies, procedures, and practices to enable efficient and transparent management
•  Initially propose systems & procedures, and then build a suitable team to support the Team in ensuring successful management of HLH Group
•  Provide professional financial, and advice management ensuring compliance with all HLH Group Policies, procedures, and practices to enable efficient and transparent management
•  Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Outlook and PowerPoint
•  Provide overall and strategic leadership and management to the finance functions which include financial management (finance), and general administration & procurement management (administration).

•  CPA /ACCA, MBA preferred
•  Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar position from properties services or commercial or retail building services or audit firm
•  Have a flare for numbers, work well with people, aggressively anticipate impacts of workload/issues to team deadlines and have a very positive work attitude
•  Strong experiences in income statement and narrative report analysis
•  Advanced Excel Skills, ability to work with lookups and pivot tables
•  Experience with Oracle Financial Analyzer or equivalent, and Business Intelligence, a plus
•  Strong organizational, analytical and interpersonal skills;
•  Strong verbal and written communication skills
•  Self‐motivated to learn new concepts and participate in new projects

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description: I. Primary Responsibilities•Promote excellent customer service and ensure satisfaction is delivered consistently.•Complete bookings with carriers and submission of shipping instructions with great accuracy•Monitor, instruct, coach, communicate to/with shippers to have the accurate booking into ICS or other systems•Understand individual customer’s standard operation processes (SOP) and comply with100% at all time•Communicate with superior to improve department processes.•Perform any other tasks as and when assigned by the team leader/manager.II. Qualifications Positive attitude, Detail-oriented, organized, and able to prioritize tasks. Good interpersonal, communication and analytical skills. Able to work as a team player, pro-active, self-motivated and high sense of responsibility. Ability to work independently and under pressure in a fast moving environment. Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Internet, Company systems Knowledge in SI / VGM for air and ocean shipments is a MUST. Candidate must possess at least bachelor degree or equivalent. Preferably specialized in Logistics/Supply Chain or equivalent. Good command of spoken and written English. Knowledge of other languages is a plus

The offer is subject to company’s performance•Vocational Training•NSSF insurance
Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country.

Our success and expertise has led to thousands of jobseekers using our services every month to search the more than 5,000 live job ads, and our shift to focus on providing companies with a tool to recruit the best staff possible has seen CAMHR become Cambodia’s elite recruitment agency.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information PCLA Recruitment HR Manager 087333908 pclarecruitment@prudential.com.kh Phnom Penh Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 087333908

Job Description: Job Purpose:The position is for the new part-time agent activation. The person is to ensure the high activation rate and increase the whole agent activities by segmentation. Main Duties:- Contribute towards the achievement of agency target - Drive segment of agents by implementing developmental and motivational activities to increase productivity and competence- Goal Settings and check-ins with new agents: Communicates sales direction; monitors performance and provide agents regular updates- Engage with Agency leaders on new Agent performance- Building and driving programs and activities to activate New Agents- Conduct regular visits/meetings with new agents individually/group- Collaborate with Training, Digital and Sales team to ensure the quality of onboarding training both virtual and physical
Job Requirement: - At least Bachelor's Degree in Markerting, Business Administration, Education or related fields- At least 2 years-experience in financial industry- Ability to see big picture and be able to execute at scale- In-dept knowledge of how to use Excel, PowerPoint and Microsoft - Be a technology Savy  - Great interpersonal and communication Skills- Excellent written skills, good speaking and listening skills in English  - Creative, Result-oriented, willing to learn

Job Description:
-Prepare Leasing Document 
-Assist indirectly for factory visit 
-Follow up enquiry 
-Appoint for negotiation with potential client 
-Ensure that information required are completed for leasing contract 
-Work with Legal team to prepare lease agreement contract after final negotiation 
-Informing Finance Department about expected tenant’s payment transfer; confirming payment clearance of tenants upon handover of properties. 
-Responsible for handover move-in process and move out process of non-renewal and early termination leases. 
-Maintaining all lease file systems, both in paper format and electronically that may be easily accessed by the team. 
-Prepare and distribute correspondence such as memos and letters. 
-Monitor weekly for the rental properties 
-Send monthly renewal/non-renewal notices (6 months prior to expiry date) 
-Discuss for advice regarding to new building quotation, and increased rental capped for renewal notice 
-Assist with Utility Bills 
-Forward monthly bills to tenants 
-Communicate with tenant and management team in case of payment delayed
Job Requirement:
-The Leasing Executive should be well organized, and have a strong ability to pay attention to detail. 
-Leasing Executive must be able to communicate with others, identify problems, and resolve potential conflicts. 
-A degree in Finance/Business or Accounting 
-Understand and can speak Chinese or English fluently 
-Good at communication, interpersonal skill, and be flexible 
-Professional attitude and appearance. 
-Ability to be resourceful and proactive when issues arise. 
-Multitasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks. 
-Customer service attitude. 
-Have good computer skills.
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

Job Description:
1-Implement sales promotion effectively
2-Build good relationship with the customers
3-Follow up payment of the customer to comply with company’s credit policy
4-Work closely with dealer in provinces.
5-Monitor  control individual sales to achieve yearly target assigned by manager
6-Provide good quality  products  services  customers through telecommunication
7-Complete credit proposal form relevant documents recommendations to ensure that the debts collected following the credit terms offered.
8-Understand  market trends by collecting  market information  suggestion  improve sales
9-Prepares reports to sale manager
10-Other duties assigned by sale manager 
11-Tele communication and selling product with customers 
12-Follow up customer to be persuade to meet decision making 
13-Explain policy and promotion event to customers
14-Solve problem with customer after delivery good in case of broken or damage
Job Requirement:
1-Graduated or is pursuing Bachelor Degree in Sales and Marketing or equivalent
2-Have 1-3 years of experience as Sales Representative
3-Have good presentation and communication skills

Job Description:
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
- Handle the company transactions per month, monthly billings and tax filings.
- Control Petty Cash.
- Control AP and AR.
- Knowledge about the inventory accounting system.
- Book-keeping all the transactions into the QuickBooks or accounting software.
- Generate or Prepare Monthly P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash-flow and other financial statement.
- Prepare Monthly sale & Inventory report.
- Reconcile bank statement with the cash flow in the system as well.
- Other task assigned by accounting manager
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
- Bachelor of Accounting, Finance or other related fields.
- At least 2 years experiences in related fields.
- Proficient to use Microsoft word, Excel, quick book.
- Integrity, ability to keep info (such as company information) confidential.
- Able to work independently and team under tight timelines.
- Be honest, hardworking and flexible.

Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

Job Description:
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
- Handle the company transactions per month, monthly billings and tax filings.
- Control Petty Cash.
- Control AP and AR.
- Knowledge about the inventory accounting system.
- Book-keeping all the transactions into the QuickBooks or accounting software.
- Generate or Prepare Monthly P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash-flow and other financial statement.

Job Description: ▪ Prepare documents including contracts, letters, legal opinions,legal updates, court documents and other legal instruments.▪ Liaises with relevant authorities for any legal issues.▪ Supervise case management and closings.▪ Advise on issues potentially and represent at relevant authorities.▪ Update templates and working tools to ensure that they can beused appropriately and effectively.▪ Perform legal research and directly advice to Head of Legal.▪ Reports to and takes instruction from Head of Legal.▪ Perform other tasks as assigned by Head of Legal.

Job Description:
1.Drafting & reviewing contracts/agreements to be signed with supplier, service providers,
contractors, and customers
2.Monitoring the implement of agreements/contracts
3.Negotiating & handling disputes with customers, contractors, tenants and etc
4.Reviewing contractual performance to ensure compliance with terms and conditions
5.Ensuring the contract are properly entered into company database securely
6.Preparing & drafting various letters in Khmer and English regarding to government institutes,
authorities, banks, and customers
7.Conducting legal research and translation upon request
8.Preparing both official and legal documents
9.Coordinate with teamwork, team leader, and manager
10.Other task assigned by Head of Legal
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
1.Bachelor’s degree in Law or related fields
2.Require experience at least 1 years of contracting officer
3.Very good at negotiation and persuasive skill
4.Good at communication and analytical skill
5.Good knowledge of construction materials industry, contract laws, construction laws and regulations
6.Be able to use MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook
7.Very good at English, both speaking & writing
8.Honest, flexible, hardworking, conscientious and well-coordinated

DOCUMENTS REQUIRE
1-National identification ( Copy )
2-Photo 4*6 ( Last 3 months )
3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)
4-Family / Residence Book ( Copy )
5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior ( Original )
6-Certificates of Educational ( Copy )

Job Description:
•	Reviewing and designing architectural and engineering plans
•	Ensuring all plans are compliant with governmental health and safety regulations.
•	Researching knowledge of various engineering disciplines, application methods, and materials.
•	Monitoring the work of Architects team and making recommendations.
•	Providing guidance to subcontractors like builders, plumbers, and electricians, and helping them interpret design specifications.
•	Liaising with clients to ensure all issues are addressed in a timely manner.
•	Ensuring the team works together to achieve set goals and targets.
•	Acting as a mentor to new Architects and helping them fine-tune their design skills and improve their industry knowledge.
•	Networking and consulting with various industry professionals.
•	Others tasks assigned by Design Manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Architecture, Engineering, Design, or similar.
- Master Degree in Architecture or Design might be preferable.
- A good portfolio and 5 years of work experience as an Architect.
- Willingness to work overtime as required.
- Excellent leadership and communication skills.
- Brilliant interpersonal and networking skills.
- Detail-oriented and highly analytical.
- In-depth understanding of CAD and AutoCAD software.
- Deadline-driven and dedicated to excellence.

Job Description:
* JOB DESCRIPTION
- Assist Marketing Department with concept planning and designs of various marketing materials.
- Develop concepts, graphics, copies, and layouts for product illustrations.
- Ensure all artworks comply with brand guidelines.
- Conduct research on competitors’ marketing materials.
- Perform other duties as needed.
Job Requirement:
* REQUIREMENT
-At least 1 year of full-time working experience in graphic design, marketing, or advertising.
- Knowledge of design and photo-editing software a must.
- Good organization and time management skills.
- Demonstrate creative thinking and good attention to details.
- Good knowledge of Microsoft Office and various social media platforms.
- Ability to work extended hours, if needed.

	1.Bachelor Degree in Account and finance and other equivalent degree
2.At least useful 1-year work experience in similar position
3.Be able to work independent
4.Be able to understand of account payable
5.Especially understand of how to clear stock in out
6.Good oral and written English and Khmer communication skill
7.Be friendly, flexible, honestly, responsibility, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure

COMPETITIVE OFFER:

• Annual Salary increment
• Annual Performance Bonus
• Learning and Development
• Group Personal Accident Insurance (Forte)
• Working Accident and Health care Insurance (NSSF)
• Gift for Khmer New year and Pchum Ben
• Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.
Note: Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.

* Note: Working time: 7: 30 AM to 5:00 PM, Lunch time 11:30 AM to 1:00 PM
Holiday: Sun / National holiday (Saturday half day.)

Job Description:
The Procurement Officer will cover Purchasing process
-Responsible to all Purchasing activity within the Company
-Responsible of Purchasing for Bill-Of-Material (BOM) and non-BOM items
-Responsible of Production Material Planning, together with input from Sales and Plant. Directly in-charge of raw material, working capital
-Work with Regional Office with regards to Raw Material Planning in term of supplier allocation, delivery, pricing and quality
-Continue to look for cost reduction opportunity, by not compromising quality and technical specification
-Ensure suppliers quality and delivery timeline meeting company’s expectation and standard
-Ensure the stock of raw materials and spare parts are sufficient for production (store management)
-Ensure all Purchasing activity adhere to Company
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or relevant field.
- 1 year of experience in logistic and Purchase Order.
- Good common in English 
- Able to work independently.
- Computer Literate: Microsoft Office E-mail &Internet.
- Be honest and responsible towards the job.
- Willing to work hard and be flexible on timings.

Job Description: RESPONSIBILITIES1.Assist Board of management in preparing the institution business plan and processing operations 2.Oversee field operations and provide necessary support and improvement actions of warehouse branches3.Regularly observe relevant external factors that have impact on business operations for necessary proactive response and practical strategy development4.Ensure policies and procedures are applied consistently and uniformly across all departments.5.Develop, implement and review operational policies and procedures 6.Oversee budgeting, reporting, planning, and service providing in each department7.Collaborate with the Sale department, Accountant department, Marketing department and warehouse department in the development and delivery of strategic events and brand enhancing initiatives8.Managing day to day operational performance9.Proactively manage all aspects of financial measurement, to include budget, and inventory control10.Plan and monitor daily activity of each department to ensure smooth progress 11.Acts as delegate of the Executive Director, when requested, to manage the organization’s departments12.Direct and guide approved policies included sale, marketing, accountant, warehouse department13.Support sale and marketing department to monitor business operations14.Interact with other departments in managing the entire operations and develop inventory control management system15.Oversight the quality of plan and manage budget operation plans, prepare and supervise all financial documents16.Evaluate and prepare reports for authorization 17.Supervise coach managers other direct subordinates and provide constructive feedback18.Identifies improvement areas and plans and implements systems to boost company effectiveness19.Assist the development strategic plans operational activity. Implement manage operational plans.
Job Requirement: REQUIREMENTS1.Bachelor's degree in business management, or closely related field. MBA preferred.2.At least 10 years experiences in management or related filed.3.Highly collaborative leadership style with the ability to respond quickly and effectively to ever-changing situations. 4.Able to multi-task and communicate with different units 5.Very organized and able to present information in a clear and logical manner6.In depth knowledge of diverse business functions and principles7.Positive attitude, self-starter, independent, detail oriented and well-organized8.Highly developed organizational and planning skills, time management skills and written/oral communications skills.9.Proficiency in Microsoft office Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook. 10.Professional proficiency in EnglishDOCUMENTS REQUIRE1-National identification ( Copy )2-Photo 4*6 ( Last 3 months )3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)4-Family / Residence Book ( Copy )5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior ( Original )6-Certificates of Educational ( Copy )

Job Description: RESPONSIBILITIES1.Assist Board of management in preparing the institution business plan and processing operations 2.Oversee field operations and provide necessary support and improvement actions of warehouse branches3.Regularly observe relevant external factors that have impact on business operations for necessary proactive response and practical strategy development4.Ensure policies and procedures are applied consistently and uniformly across all departments.5.Develop, implement and review operational policies and procedures 6.Oversee budgeting, reporting, planning, and service providing in each department7.Collaborate with the Sale department, Accountant department, Marketing department and warehouse department in the development and delivery of strategic events and brand enhancing initiatives8.Managing day to day operational performance9.Proactively manage all aspects of financial measurement, to include budget, and inventory control10.Plan and monitor daily activity of each department to ensure smooth progress 11.Acts as delegate of the Executive Director, when requested, to manage the organization’s departments12.Direct and guide approved policies included sale, marketing, accountant, warehouse department13.Support sale and marketing department to monitor business operations14.Interact with other departments in managing the entire operations and develop inventory control management system15.Oversight the quality of plan and manage budget operation plans, prepare and supervise all financial documents16.Evaluate and prepare reports for authorization 17.Supervise coach managers other direct subordinates and provide constructive feedback18.Identifies improvement areas and plans and implements systems to boost company effectiveness19.Assist the development strategic plans operational activity. Implement manage operational plans.
Job Requirement: REQUIREMENTS1.Bachelor's degree in business management, or closely related field. MBA preferred.2.At least 10 years experiences in management or related filed.3.Highly collaborative leadership style with the ability to respond quickly and effectively to ever-changing situations. 4.Able to multi-task and communicate with different units 5.Very organized and able to present information in a clear and logical manner6.In depth knowledge of diverse business functions and principles7.Positive attitude, self-starter, independent, detail oriented and well-organized8.Highly developed organizational and planning skills, time management skills and written/oral communications skills.9.Proficiency in Microsoft office Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook. 10.Professional proficiency in EnglishDOCUMENTS REQUIRE1-National identification ( Copy )2-Photo 4*6 ( Last 3 months )3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)4-Family / Residence Book ( Copy )5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior ( Original )6-Certificates of Educational ( Copy )

Job Description: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES• Oversees administrative and accounts staff• Maintains smooth operations of the front desk and manages inventory • Ensures facilities meet government regulations and environmental, health and security standards• Coordinates meetings, appointments, and conference events• Handles all data and information with confidentiality and care• Pursues projects of opportunity in line with the growing capability of the company such as developing marketing plans• Strengthens rapports with existing clients and establishes relationship with prospective customers• Oversees furnishing of the office space and supplements basic facilities • Conducts office tours for clients and registration of new clients • Develop and oversees annual events and programmes
Job Requirement: Job Requirements•Bachelor's degree and above in business administration, communications, or related field•Proven experience (5 years) in office operations and administration•Proficient communication, customer service and interpersonal skills, both in English and Khmer •Exceptionally organized with an attention to detail •Friendly and professional •Ability to work autonomously and as a team leader

Job Description:
1.	Day to day management of operation on site, ensuring that the project is brought to a successful completion 
2.	Ensuring timely management of any unforeseen delays
3.	Regular monitoring and liaison with the contractors as required
4.	Plan and efficiently organize the site facilities and logistics, ensuring all equipment on site is fit for purpose and only operated by appropriately trained staff
5.	Requisition all materials and oversee the deliveries and ensure they are done so in adequate time in line with the construction schedule
6.	Ensure safe and healthy standards upheld by all contractors and sub-contractors on site.
7.	Ensure workmanship and material standards are achieved in accordance with specifications, building regulations
8.	Create and maintain good relations with contractors, design teams, and neighbors as well as any suppliers
9.	Others tasks as assigned by General Manager
Job Requirement:
Graduate from Architect or Engineer or relate file 
- Minimum 2 years experience, preferably 5 years
- Work experience in construction covering both site and office
- good working understanding of local regulations, established relationships with local contractors and authority departments and procedures
- High level communication skills, a good understanding of spoken and written English
- Achievement of agreed dates for production of drawings
- As built drawings that reflect the site conditions

Job Description: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES1. Write copy for a variety of media including social, print, video, and online2.Edit and proof work to ensure high editorial standards are met across all content outputs3. Interpret creative briefs to develop and produce creative concepts through execution4. Research and understand the client's needs and target audiences, through online searches5. Reviews of existing research, interviews with subject matter experts, and in-person meetings6. Write original copy and edit content for a range of corporate marketing and communications materials7. Collaborate with a team and creative staff from concept development to delivery of final product8. Present copy concepts and final deliverables to internal team, and to client representative as needed, and participate in client pitches on occasion9. Revise copy based on internal and client feedback/direction10. Do any task assigned by manager
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Marketing, or Communications2. Have 3-5 years experiences in content marketing or copywriting, preferably with an agency3. Knowledge of Microsoft Office Applications4. Strong creative thinking skills and ability to think conceptually5. Comfortable working independently with little direction under tight deadlines6. Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a diligent eye for detail, language, flow, and grammar7. Proven ability to demonstrate brand voice8. Strong attention to detail9. Excellent portfolio of work

Job Description:
JOB DESCRIPTION
JOB TITLE: ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER
REPORT TO: ADMINISTRATIVE DIRECTOR
LOCATION: HEAD OFFICE, PHNOM PENH 
SALARY: 250$ - 350$

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
1.	Manage and control all kind of administrative documents to file in order
2.	Ensure all office equipment is well maintained and serviced
3.	Make monthly report relevant office supply
4.	Check attendance day-to-day and make report to Administrative Manager
5.	Maintains payroll information from time to time by collecting from the campus
6.	Ensure all update information receive on time from the campus
7.	Collect document support to do payroll and submitted to Admin Manager  
8.	Process and monitor the system related to Staff ID Card and Parking
9.	Other related duties as manager assigned
Job Requirement:
1.	At least 1-year experience in administrative or related field
2.	Be self-motivated and able to work to tight deadlines
3.	Have good computer skill (Microsoft office, Excel, Power point and internet and E-mail)
4.	Creative and flexible in work, be able to work effectively and cooperatively with Co-workers 
5.	Good interpersonal skill, hardworking, honest and high responsibility
6.	Able working under pressure

job title: អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសកសិកម្ម
position: អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសកសិកម្ម
Job Description: 1-ចេះថែទាំដំណាំស្រូវ និង បន្លែគ្រប់ប្រភេទ2-ចេះថែទាំដំណាំហូបផ្លែ និង ដើមឈើគ្រប់ប្រភេទ
Job Requirement: លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស៖1-ភេទប្រុស2-អាយុចាប់ពី 25 ឆ្នាំ ឡើង3-ធ្លាប់ឆ្លងកាត់វគ្គសិក្សាខ្លី លើជំនាញកសិកម្ម4-មានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និង ស្រលាញ់ការងារកសិកម្ម5-កន្លែងធ្វើការស្ថិតនៅសួនឧស្សាហកម្មវ៉ាយសេវិន ផ្លូវជាតិលេខ 4 ហួសផ្សារថ្នល់ទទឹង 1 គ.មអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖1-ផ្តល់ប្រាក់ខែ សមរម្យទៅតាមសមត្ថភាពរបស់បេក្ខជន2-ផ្តល់ទីកន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ3-មានប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ 4-មានការធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងទៅលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ5-មានប្រាក់ធ្វើការថែមម៉ោង6-ការឈប់សម្រាកពិធីបុណ្យជាតិនានា។ទូរស័ព្ទ៖ 017 809 182 , 016 225 883

Job Description:
1.Builds and develops new client business within a vertical market by pursing business opportunities with strategic targets in key industries and cultivating relationships with existing clients.
2.Delivers compelling calls and presentations to introduce capabilities and value proposition.
3.Negotiates and communicates complex concepts/business issues to a variety of audiences.
4.Identifies and evaluates new markets and partnership opportunities through direct prospecting, networking,
5.Attendance and participation with various industry and professional groups and networking associations.
6.Provides expertise and direction for the day to day management of bid packages in the development pipeline.
7.Provides client specific opportunity assessment, market evaluation, market research, financial evaluation, and other marketing needs required throughout the proposal preparation and delivery process.
8.Incorporates customer needs and input / feedback from both internal and external groups.
9.Prudently manages resources within budgetary guidelines according to company policy and within ethical corporate governance guidelines.
10.Demonstrates positively mission, vision, value statements, reputation, code of ethics, standards, policies and
procedures internally and throughout the marketplace.
11.Other task assigned by business development manager
Job Requirement:
1.Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Economics or related discipline required
2.At least 2 years of experience in related field.
3.Ability to manage complex projects and multi-task
4.Excellent organizational skills, honest, motivated and hard working.
5.Fluent in English, Chinese is preferrable.
6.Proficient in Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint.
7.Good understanding of market research techniques, statistical and data analysis methods
8.Thorough understanding of social media and web analysis
9.Exhibit strong business acumen, skills and maturity and the ability to work effectively with others

DOCUMENTS REQUIRE
1-National identification (Copy)
2-Photo 4*6 (Last 3 months)
3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)
4-Family / Residence Book (Copy)
5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior (Original)
6-Certificates of Educational (Copy)

Job Description:
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
- Quantity surveyors manage the costs on a construction project. 
- Help to ensure that the construction project is completed within its projected budget. 
- Up-to-date all reports from engineers at site.
- Calculate and compare quantities between reports of quantities performed at the worksite.
- Feedback of computational results to project manager.
- Keep relevant legal documents such as contracts signed plans from the project owner.
- Calculate the cost of labor and prepared the document payment or percentage payment (to subcontractors).
- Calculate the cost of work and make a backup payment of the contract with the contractor.
- Propose a plan to conduct a site visit at any time when it is necessary. 
- Sum up the volume of project implementation, based on the overall conditions, for reporting project volumes and payments to project manager.
- Forecast the cost of the different materials needed for the project.
- Cooperate with site engineer and designer to be evaluate the process growth at site construction.
- Prepare tender documents, contracts, budgets, bills of quantities and other documentation.
- Procure or agree the services of contractors and/or subcontractors who work on the construction of the project.
- Liaise with the client and other construction professionals, such as project managers and site engineers.
- Preparing reports directly to Project Manager.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
- Graduate Bachelor degree or Master degree in Civil Engineering or related filed.
- At least 2 years experiences with industrial construction.
- A good working knowledge of MS Excel and the ability to learn how to use specialist software.
- Excellent relationship-building and interpersonal skills.
- Good at team working.
- The ability to coordinate with project manager, designer and Managing Director.
- Attention to detail and a methodical approach to work.
- Willing to work overtime and may be required to work in shifts.
