company_name: Tech Seng Supply All Kind of Steels Co.,Ltd
Job Description:
•Optimize plan orders by considering minimum order quantity, full container load, lead time, and safety stock.
•To work closely with sale team and other stakeholders on steel and ceramics material start operation purchasing to ensure continuity in supply.
•Communicate and coordinate with sales or vendors to re-act faster in case that materials are urgently needed to fulfil the demand plan.
•Study and analyse historical actual sale quantities to predict estimated future demand for plan orders.
•Simulate material requirement planning and demand if any constraint related to shipment, plan orders, or storage space.
•Prepare latest forecast of demand quantity and send it to Vendor and S&OP on regular basis.
•Break down big quantity of orders and prepare weekly/monthly delivery schedule to suppliers to ensure material are enough for demand supply and space is enough for storage
•To assist on monitoring order status from time to time to ensure delivery time meets the requirement date.
•To keep update information on any changes which effecting supply planning to management and other key stakeholders.
•To closely monitor and follow with suppliers on issues to speed up the delivery as per schedule.
•To use Sun system & Microsoft systems for doing operation record by daily, weekly to be updated timely.
•To learn, develop skill to meet competency skills required.
•To do other tasks assigned by superiors and management
Job Requirement:
•Bachelor’s degree in business administration or a related field.
•At least 1-2 years of experiences in planning and related to Inventory controlling.
•Business management.
•Operational and reporting.
•Supply planning.
•Good in English.
•Advanced level in Microsoft Excel and Power Point
•Experience in using ERP/Planning system such as Sun system
•Able to communicate in English clearly
•Strong interpersonal skills
•Strong communication skills
•Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
•Able to work with and manage changes
•Valid driver’s license.
•Flexible to travel.
•Willing to change mindset.
•Working with challenges.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   067862862 chrep.eng@techseng.com #137B, Street 271, Sangkat Boeng Tompun, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 067862862

Job Description:
- Undertake costs analysis for design and project work based on MEP drawings, including undertaking value engineering where required
- Undertake feasibility studies based upon the Client’s requirement
- Source and select construction materials;
- Source and select sub-contractors;
- Prepare cost plans to enable design teams to produce practical designs for construction projects, which involves liaising with architects, engineers and subcontractors
- Prepare sub-contract documents and recommendation of sub-contractors
- Negotiate and finalizing sub-contractual terms with selected sub-contractors/supplier
- Prepare monthly progress claim to Client
- Prepare monthly progress payment to sub-contractor/supplier
- Value completed work, review contractor payment claims, certify as per actual progress and arrange appropriate payments with Client
- Review and negotiate change orders / variation order with Client and sub-contractors
- Control all stages of projects within predetermined budget and expenditure.
- Monitor and keep track of project progress and are responsible for the measurement and valuation of variations in the work during the contract, for agreement of interim payments and the final account.
- Work as part of a team to ensure that the requirements of the client are delivered.
- Negotiate final settlement with contractors at completion of project and prepare final cost report for Client.
- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
- Diploma/Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or Electrical Engineering, or related field
- Min. 3 years of MEP construction estimating experience, financial experience, construction experience, or related field
- In-depth understanding of MEP materials, pricing, and industry
- Experienced at compiling and following strict budgets; strong estimating and financial analysis skills
- Advanced knowledge of taking off and bills of quantities
- The capacity to create detailed reports that are easily understood by a wide range of people
- Strong aptitude for numbers, spreadsheets, and financial reports
- Problem solving skills, Able to analyze problems and strategize for better solutions
- Strong Mathematical skills
- Good in time management skills with the ability to self-manage time efficiently and meet the deadlines
- Proficient in computer skills and Microsoft Office Suite
- Excellent in using Microsoft Office and AutoCAD, familiar with Revit MEP is a plus.
- Proficient in English
- Proficiency in Mandarin preferred

Established since 2015, SingBuild laids its roots in Phnom Penh, Cambodia with a focus on providing design and build services for our clients. Job Description:
- Undertake costs analysis for design and project work based on MEP drawings, including undertaking value engineering where required
- Undertake feasibility studies based upon the Client’s requirement
- Source and select construction materials;
- Source and select sub-contractors;
- Prepare cost plans to enable design teams to produce practical designs for construction projects, which involves liaising with architects, engineers and subcontractors
- Prepare sub-contract documents and recommendation of sub-contractors
- Negotiate and finalizing sub-contractual terms with selected sub-contractors/supplier
- Prepare monthly progress claim to Client
- Prepare monthly progress payment to sub-contractor/supplier
- Value completed work, review contractor payment claims, certify as per actual progress and arrange appropriate payments with Client
- Review and negotiate change orders / variation order with Client and sub-contractors
- Control all stages of projects within predetermined budget and expenditure.
- Monitor and keep track of project progress and are responsible for the measurement and valuation of variations in the work during the contract, for agreement of interim payments and the final account.
- Work as part of a team to ensure that the requirements of the client are delivered.
- Negotiate final settlement with contractors at completion of project and prepare final cost report for Client.
- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
- Diploma/Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or Electrical Engineering, or related field
- Min. 3 years of MEP construction estimating experience, financial experience, construction experience, or related field
- In-depth understanding of MEP materials, pricing, and industry
- Experienced at compiling and following strict budgets; strong estimating and financial analysis skills
- Advanced knowledge of taking off and bills of quantities
- The capacity to create detailed reports that are easily understood by a wide range of people
- Strong aptitude for numbers, spreadsheets, and financial reports
- Problem solving skills, Able to analyze problems and strategize for better solutions
- Strong Mathematical skills
- Good in time management skills with the ability to self-manage time efficiently and meet the deadlines
- Proficient in computer skills and Microsoft Office Suite
- Excellent in using Microsoft Office and AutoCAD, familiar with Revit MEP is a plus.
- Proficient in English
- Proficiency in Mandarin preferred
Company Profile:
Established since 2015, SingBuild laids its roots in Phnom Penh, Cambodia with a focus on providing design and build services for our clients. Our dedicated team of Architects and Designers fulfill our clients’ dreams by challenging norms to reimagine spaces whilst managing functionality. It is our commitment to create exciting spaces that resonate with our clients’ needs. Our in-house Civil Engineers and M&E consultants seeks to push boundaries to deliver innovative and sustainable design solutions that uphold the integrity of all projects, where technical aspects are in compliance with internationally acclaimed standards. With project management being one of our many key strengths, we go the distance to bring our clients’ imagination to life.

Our Mission is to Design enriching spaces and continuously build our company with our clients’ Trust to deliver Quality designs with ultimate Precision
Contact Info: Contact Information HR TEAM  012925588 hr@singbuild.com Phnom Penh S1-03 Olympia City Building C1, Street Monireth (217) Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 012925588

Job Description: - Salary: High salary and Perk- Age: 25 – 40 years old- Hours: Full-Time (Mon-Sat, 44 hours per week)** Job Description:We are looking for an Architect to perform all phases of architectural work including planning, designing and overseeing the construction. You will be involved in new building designs, extensions, alterations, restorations and conservations from the earliest stages right through to completion. The goal is to match client’s needs and to produce sustainable, functional and aesthetically pleasing designs.** Job Responsibilities:- Develop ideas keeping in mind client’s needs, building’s usage and environmental impact- Meeting with clients to discuss project objectives, needs, and budget- Preparing and presenting design proposals, including detailed drawings of finished buildings, renovations, or restorations- Meeting with construction professionals and clients to discuss feasibility of designs- Reviewing local rules and regulations to ensure the construction project falls within all constraints- Creating detailed drawings and specifications for architectural projects- Specifying the materials needed for construction of projects- Control project from start to finish to ensure high quality, innovative and functional design- Produce detailed blueprints and make any necessary corrections- Compile project specifications- Keep within budgets and timelines- Ensure that all works are carried out to specific standards, building codes, guidelines and regulations- Make on site visits to check on project status and report on project- Participating in project management throughout the construction- Working with computer-aided design software to create blueprints and images- Working with contractors, surveyors, and building service engineers to create a construction schedule and bring the designs to fruition- Supervising construction of buildings to ensure projects meet deadlines, stay on budget, and adhere to the original vision for the design- Resolving issues that come up during construction- Organize and manage permit documents- Resolve complex design issues with innovative and practical solutions
Job Requirement:
- Diploma/Bachelor degree in Architecture
- At least 5+ Years proven working experience as an architect
- Strong portfolio to prove artistic skills
- Good design and drawing skills to demonstrate your flair for architecture
- Expert knowledge of building products, construction details and relevant rules, regulations and quality standards
- Excellent drawing skills and familiarity with design software (Adobe Photoshop, Sketch Up, 3d Studio VIZ or similar)
- Strong imagination and the ability to think and create in three dimensions
- Visual awareness and an eye for detail
- Communication and project management skills
- Strong Creativity and Visualization Skills
- Strong Problem Solving and Critical Thinking skills
- Ability to produce 2D and 3D design drawings for meeting presentations
- Team player with a positive attitude
- Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
- A strong imagination and the ability to think and create in three dimensions
- A keen interest in buildings and the built environment - an insight into Building Information Modelling (BIM) will also be a significant advantage
- Good organizational and negotiation skills
- An understanding about the relationship between people, buildings and the wider environment
- Proficient In English

Company Profile:
OUR HISTORY
PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. We started with a small business, but as a result of our dedication, loyalty, reliability, affordable prices, excellent customer services, excellent range of products and technical expertise, we have grown remarkably successful that we are now well recognized as one of the biggest IT store in Cambodia. Our reputation, in the last two decades, has gone far and beyond which has led us to expand as the largest IT company to supply genuine products and warranty services to customers. PTC Computer is privileged and honored to be partners with well-known international IT brands as authorized distributor and service provider in Cambodia. As a result, we are the Authorized Distributor of over fifteen brands.

Job Description:
- Plan activities and allocate responsibilities as well as develop standard operation procedures for all departments to achieve the most efficient operating model;
- Develop proposals to initiate work and capital projects and oversee the timely construction of these projects;
- Manage and develop the Property Operations team and staffs with regard to performance appraisal, staff development, and team development, engagement and communication. 
- Conducts periodic on-site inspections, including quarterly inspection reports, and work with vendors and construction companies to handle warranty, various maintenance and repair items.
- Ensure all emergency repairs are completed in a timely required.
- Maintains property by investigating and resolving resident’s complaint; enforcing rules of occupancy; inspecting vacant units and completing repairs; planning renovations; contracting with landscaping.
- Maintain Property Management Databases;
- Solve accounts receivable problems which include late fees, defaults, and disputes;
- Review of monthly, quarterly and annual financial reports;
- Key role to interacts, communicates and answers incoming questions from prospective customers
- Plan & supervise the day-to-day handover activities to customers.
- Provide innovate solutions to ongoing challenges and ensure customer satisfaction and positive customer experience.
- Monitor the effectiveness of pre-handover inspections, ensure feedback is followed up and escalated where necessary. 
- Continuously improve, streamline and enforce the Handover policies & processes.
- Monitor current working practices, and effect changes in policies as and when required to enhance quality, achieve customer satisfaction and welfare.
- Supervise cost control, and ensure adherence to the budget.
- Plan and mange operational costs and budget forecast.

Job Description:
•	Provides and/or coordinates the provision of technical guidance, consultation, related support to clientele within area of program focus; provides day-to-day problem solving as necessary on day-to-day program-related needs and issues.
•	May supervise and/or lead staff and/or student employees, as assigned.
•	Plans and coordinates the development, implementation, and execution of sub-programs, special projects, and other initiatives designed to achieve the overall mission, goals, and objectives of the program.
•	Plans, develops, and implements strategies for identifying and generating funding and/or resource opportunities for program activities, to include development of grant and other fundraising proposals.
•	Other task assign by upper supervisor.

•	Be well known of program and software system

Job Description:
- Perform daily outlet visits with sales team in allocated areas and ensure overall servicing of outlets are effective
- Ensure product representation is visible and well stocked in all outlets at all time
- Manage deployment of promoter girls in outlets effectively to achieve sales objective
- Oversee the supervision of sales team, including work allocation, training, and problem resolution.
- Monitor sales performance and propose strategic sales initiatives to meet allocated targets
- Manage distributors and distribution objective, ensuring distributors achieve their targets set
- Collect market intelligence on the needs of customers, monitor and feedback the strategy and tactics of its competitors regularly
- Develop solid and long-term influential relationships with distributors and all outlets in assigned territories
- Perform related duties as assigned from time to time as required by the company
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Business Administration/ Studies, Commerce or Management
- At least 3 - 5 years of outdoor sales experience preferably from FMCG
- Able to collaborate across different levels of the organization and a proven ability to build and manage relationships internally and externally.
- Excellent communicator and good interpersonal skill, able to handle difficult business situations and negotiate well
- Good command of English, arithmetic skill required and computer literate
- Require the possession of a valid state driving license and be able to drive a vehicle with a willingness to work a flexible schedule with night market visits.
- Ability to supervise and guide assigned staff to achieve task objectives
- Ability to maintain performance expectations given limited resources
- An outgoing and friendly personality, honest and with integrity

* Address : Vattanac Capital Tower – Level 8, # 66, Preah Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
* Website : www.vattanacbrewery.com
* All application documents will be treated confidentially and will not be returned. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
Job Description:
o Handle small and basic account customer
o Work toward achieving sales target
o Perform sales cycle from start to closing of sales process, from the moment customer walk into the store to delivery and processing payment
o Enter lead into Lead Report by collecting customer visit information regarding their name, address, project site, interest of materials and forecast amount
o Create customer profile to accurately and professionally input Customer Name, address, phone number, project site address, site contact information and so on
o Coordinate delivery with dispatch team to make sure the orders are delivered on time
o Create quotation for customers when needed
o Coordinate samples and catalogs when needed
o Prepare and provide product specifications to customers when needed
o Provide customer service at all-time regardless whether the customer is your own customers or other peers’ customers as long as they walk into the showroom
o Manage showroom merchandise zone assigned by Store Supervisor
o Make sure the products in the managed zone are well displayed, clean, tidy and price tag are properly placed
o Create price tag for newly displayed items in the managed zone
o Checking displayed racks in the managed zone to make sure the items are fully filled up and nothing is missing
o Responsible for the assigned tasks and get it done on a timely manner
o Solving customers’ issues and complains 
o Create and submit daily customer walk in/visit report to the Team Lead 
o Create and submit weekly Activities and Cleanliness Report to the Team Lead
o Other tasks by Management
Job Requirement:
 Requirements
  • BA in Sales and Marketing or related field
  • At least 1 year experienced in sales
  • Strong in communication skill both written and speaking
  • Flexible and friendly
  • Good in problem solving skill
  • Patient
 Work time and Benefits
  • Basic Salary 
  • Work time: (Mon-Sat) 7:30am-5:30pm (Break 1hours) request to work Sunday if necessary
  • Uniform
  • Annual leave 
  • Annual trip
  • National Holiday
  • Sale Commission
  • Bonus incentive
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Are you a dynamic professional with a passion for success who is looking for an opportunity that will take your career to a whole new level? If yes, we wish to invite you to apply for the follow positions:

company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
Job Description:
1. Managing pre-shipping PO
  - Shop and determine the lowest rate freight cost from 
    different ports of origin 
  - Plan and book PO shipment both local and   international 
  - Inform Purchasing team on the estimate departure    
    (ETD) and estimate arrival (ETA) for each PO 

2. Managing on boarded PO 
  - Check and confirm on the original bill (BL) and packing 
    list (PL) 
  - Monitor closely on the PO shipping schedule 
    Check and prepare original clearance documents for   
    clearance purposes 
  - Coordinate with clearance company to process the    
    clearance paperwork 
  - Prepare packing list copy for each PO and send to 
    warehouse inbound team and HQ inventory team. 

3. Managing off boarded PO 
  - Follow up closely with the clearance company on the 
    clearance status 
  - Coordinate and arrange the containers/trucks transfer to 
    designated warehouse 
  - Inform warehouse team/inventory team on the exact 
    schedule arrival date 

4. Managing PO request 
  - Check and confirm on PO request from all departments 
  - Get Finance Director to sign and approved on the PO  
    request form 
  - Group the PO by vendor and send them to purchasing team 
    to process in the system 
  - Liaise with showroom sales when their PO request has 
    arrived and has been receipted. 

5. Project Management a. Maintain a database of outstanding projects
  - Track dates, requirement 
  - Record the status and progress of the project 
  - Monitor PO and delivery schedule 
  - Liaise with project sales when stock has arrived and has 
    been receipted. 

6. Inventory Management (daily) 
  - Run inventory management report 
  - Identify low or back order codes and action low stock     
    SKUs accordingly (Expedite PO, substitute, advise 
    customer, check incoming PO) 
  - Generate low stock report to purchasing team 

7. Backorder management (daily) 
  - Run backorder report 
  - Check for new order on backorder 

8. Master data management 
  - Create new item onto the system 
  - Manage and clean up the old item data
Job Requirement:
− Bachelor degree in Business administration majoring in Supply Chain Management or related field.
− At least one-year experiences in Supply Chain Planning Experience.
− Be able to work under pressure.
− Communication skills in speaking/Writing English.
− Knowledge of computer literacy (Microsoft office word, Power point, Excel)
− Good interpersonal and Communication skills.
− Strong skill in organization
− Very patience, Flexible, Honest and Friendly


Application Information

Job Description:
● Understanding to apply accounting transaction to CIFRS for SMEs of the Company Construction and Real Estate 
● Assist to prepare policy for Finance Division and other department that relevant and effected to financial of the company 
● Timely Preparation of Management Accounts Pack, Forecasts and Budgets
● Prepare and review the Monthly and Annually of Financial Report with timely effectiveness
● Prepare the consolidate Monthly and Annually Financial Report with timely effectiveness
● Review & Preparation of Financial Information for Board Reports
● Manage cashflow for the Division and monitor working capital for Division incl Debtors & Creditors Analysis
● Present Management Accounts Pack including commentary on variances against budget, forecast and other KPI's
● Ensure all costs incurred are appropriately allocated and recharged
● Ensure all costs of BOQ and BOM have been controlled properly and effectiveness to construction operation. 
● Ensure effective controls are in place and that risk/opportunity is accurately reported
● Review and monitor Customer/Supplier Retentions/Labor/ Sub-Constructer and so on
● Audit and authorize payment run and manual cheques
● Participation in Audits, co-ordinate for Division
● Identify and Implement system and process Improvements
● Establish and maintain internal accounting controls.
● Target and assign all significant responsibilities.  
● Oversee monthly close procedures ensuring all major construction project-specific financial and operational milestones have been completed per the month-end close calendar.
● Manage the financial year-end close procedures of all construction projects ensuring all major financial and construction in-field major milestones have been completed per the year-end close calendar established by the Director of Finance and Operations
● Provide guidance to the Finance Supervisor and related staff on day-to-day Finance/Accounting matters
● Oversee the custom construction cash reconciliations ensuring that adequate cash balances are being maintained. Report monthly cash flow reports and forecasts based on the construction schedules to the Director of Finance and Operations
● Implement various construction accounting risk management procedures to mitigate financial risk, including the ongoing close-out of purchase orders
● Track and monitor the transfer of funds between construction projects and various departments
● Develop the automated workflows to assist all related departments
● Deploy budgets by developing logic-based construction budget models taking into consideration the project scope and timeline and the contingency needs of the site
● Assign cost plans by distributing funds into various categories of construction budget including but not limited to professional services and fees, furniture/fixtures/equipment, technology, and construction. Validate budgets by performing a scope-to-budget review
● Develop reporting dashboards to support to day to day needs of the Director of Finance and Operations
● Conducts internal reviews to ensure compliance with procedures and contracts
● Provides functional guidance to the Supervisor/Financial Services with the Director Finance and Operations. This guidance includes coordinating activities in conjunction with the External Audit
● Performs other tasks and duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required (ACCA is a plus)
● At least five years of progressive accounting/finance experience
● Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
● Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
● Proven working experience as Management level
● Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations 
● Advanced Computer skill on MS office, MS Access, other MS office programs and Accounting Software and database.
● NAV / Microsoft D365 System is optional
● English language proficiency
● Ability to manipulate large amount of data
● Willingness to learn and develop new skills
● Motivating and coordination other
● Ability to lead, motivate and support accounting team
● Ability to clearly and concisely communicate with non-accounting professionals

Company Profile:
OUR HISTORY
PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. We started with a small business, but as a result of our dedication, loyalty, reliability, affordable prices, excellent customer services, excellent range of products and technical expertise, we have grown remarkably successful that we are now well recognized as one of the biggest IT store in Cambodia. Our reputation, in the last two decades, has gone far and beyond which has led us to expand as the largest IT company to supply genuine products and warranty services to customers. PTC Computer is privileged and honored to be partners with well-known international IT brands as authorized distributor and service provider in Cambodia. As a result, we are the Authorized Distributor of over fifteen brands.
